p: It should be noted though that we only tested a limited amount of populations of C. stoebe of the three geo-cytotypes in the experiment. Nevertheless, the increased impact of 4x C. stoebe (no differences between EU4x and NA4x) on NA plant species as detected in this experiment is unlikely to be driven by post-introduction evolution of increased impact of C. stoebe, as we found no significant difference in impact between EUU4x and NA4x C. stoebe. This pattern is well in line with earlier results of a greenhouse experiment [ 38] as well as with a field study [ 19].
